Package info.addisoncrump.oklahoma.bot.auth.event

Event package for all authentication activity. All stages of crossauthentication are represented as events within this package.
Since:
1.0.0
See Also:
AuthenticationService, DiscordAuthenticationEventListener, MinecraftAuthenticationEventListener
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HandshakeCancelledEvent
    Event which is fired if the handshake attempted timed out, as fired and handled by the AuthenticationService instance.
    HandshakeInitializedEvent
    Event which is fired after the handshake finishes initialization, as fired and handled by the MinecraftAuthenticationEventListener instance.
    HandshakeStartedEvent
    Event which is fired after the handshake is started, as fired and handled by the MinecraftAuthenticationEventListener instance.
    NoUserFoundWithNameEvent
    Event which, when fired, precludes the firing of the HandshakeStartedEvent if the Minecraft player referenced by the CrossAuthenticateInitializeCommand is not currently logged in to the Minecraft server.
    VerificationAttemptEvent
    Event which is fired after a Discord user attempts verification, as fired by the CrossAuthenticateVerifyCommand instance.
    VerificationFailedEvent
    Event which is fired after a verification attempt fails, as fired by the AuthenticationService instance.
    VerificationSuccessEvent
    Event which is fired after a verification attempt succeeds, as fired by the AuthenticationService instance.
